I thought I should drop you a note to keep you informed
as to our activities relative to the 19£6 Supplement to
the National Tape Recording Catalog, the project of AERT-
DAVI.
Letters have gone out under the signature of Gertrude
Broderick and myself to fourteen producers of programs
in the NAEB Library. We asked these producers to send
us program descriptions of their materials in which we
thought we might be interested* A sample of the type
of letter sent out is enclosed.
Could you tell me to whom I should write concerning
permission to utilize materials produced by Randolph,
FBS and the BBC?
I will continue to keep you informed concerning our
activities. We certainly appreciate your cooperation.
Sincerely,
/7V7 ^
L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
